org.cpsolver.studentsct.online.selection

Class EqualWeightCriterion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.studentsct.online.selection.OnlineSectioningCriterion
      • org.cpsolver.studentsct.online.selection.EqualWeightCriterion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MultiCriteriaBranchAndBoundSelection.SelectionComparator, MultiCriteriaBranchAndBoundSelection.SelectionCriterion

    public class EqualWeightCriterion
extends OnlineSectioningCriterion
    Equal weighting multi-criteria selection criterion. Much like the OnlineSectioningCriterion, but course request priorities are ignored. Most complete solution is preferred instead.
    Version:
    StudentSct 1.3 (Student Sectioning)
